message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
That's a bit higher than I was hoping for. I'm interested but I can only go up to $105 right now.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130.
I appreciate you being flexible, but $130 is still a bit more than I can afford right now. How about $115?
I'm not willing to go as low as $115, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $125?
